CMind Quiz Helper

CMind Quiz Helper is your intelligent study companion that makes quiz-taking more efficient and educational. With a simple click of a floating button, get instant analysis of quiz questions complete with detailed explanations and confidence scores.

Key Features:
• Instant Analysis: Click the floating lightning bolt button to analyze any quiz question
• Smart Detection: Automatically identifies questions, options, and correct answers
• Detailed Explanations: Receive comprehensive explanations for each answer
• Confidence Scoring: Know how confident the AI is about each analysis
• Clean Interface: Minimalist design that doesn't interfere with your workflow
• Easy Toggle: Enable/disable the helper button whenever you need it
• History Tracking: Keep track of previously analyzed questions
• Secure Login: Your data is protected with secure authentication

Perfect for:
✓ Students reviewing practice quizzes
✓ Self-learners verifying their understanding
✓ Anyone looking to learn from their quiz-taking experience

How It Works:
1. Log in to your CMind account
2. Enable the floating helper button
3. Click the lightning bolt whenever you need assistance
4. Get instant analysis with detailed explanations

Privacy & Security:
• Secure authentication system
• No personal data collection
• Private analysis results
• Encrypted communications

Technical Requirements:
- Works with Chrome browser version 88 or later
- Internet connection required
- Free account registration needed

Note: This tool is designed for educational purposes and practice quizzes. Please follow your institution's academic integrity guidelines.

Support:
Need help? Contact us at frederick@buzzchat.site for assistance.

Make your quiz-taking experience more educational and efficient with CMind Quiz Helper - your intelligent study companion.
